action.add.description: The label for the add action/button

action.go_back.description: Label for a go back action/button

action.sign_out.description: Label for the sign out menu item

errors.http_fetch.description: Generic error message when we fail to make a request to the specified URL

errors.http_fetch_json_decoding.description: Error message when we fail to decode a JSON response from the specified URL
errors.http_fetch_json_decoding.message: Failed to decode JSON response from {url}

errors.http_status.description: Generic error message when we fail to make a request to the specified URL. Typical values for 'status' are '404' or '500', typical values for 'statusText' are 'Not Found' or 'Internal Server Error'
errors.http_status.message: Request to {url} failed with status code {status} {statusText}

errors.not_logged_in.description: Error message when a request was sent which was supposed to be authenticated, but turns out that the user is not logged in. This is a rare error, usually because of a race-condition during login or logout.

footer.copyright_notice.description: The copyright notice on the footer

footer.help_and_support.description: Label for the help and support (to https://ems.element.io/support) link in the footer

footer.legal.description: Label for the legal (to https://element.io/legal) link in the footer

footer.privacy.description: Label for the privacy (to https://element.io/legal/privacy) link in the footer

header.user_menu.title.description: The title of the menu which shows what account is logged in and have a few options like signing out

navigation.dashboard.description: Label for the dashboard navigation item in the main navigation sidebar

navigation.documentation.description: Label for the documentation navigation link (to https://docs.element.io/) in the main navigation sidebar

navigation.registration_tokens.description: Label for the registration tokens navigation item in the main navigation sidebar

navigation.rooms.description: Label for the rooms navigation item in the main navigation sidebar

navigation.users.description: Label for the users navigation item in the main navigation sidebar

pages.dashboard.current_ess_version.description: On the dashboard, this shows the current ESS version

pages.dashboard.latest_ess_version.description: On the dashboard, this shows the latest ESS release

pages.dashboard.new_ess_release.description: On the dashboard, this shows that there is a new ESS release available

pages.dashboard.registered_users_count.description: On the dashboard, this shows the number of users registered in MAS

pages.dashboard.rooms_count.description: On the dashboard, this shows the Synapse uptime

pages.dashboard.running_latest_ess.description: On the dashboard, this shows that you're running the latest ESS version

pages.dashboard.synapse_version.description: On the dashboard, this shows the Synapse version

pages.dashboard.title.description: The title of the dashboard page

pages.generic_error.go_home.description: When an unxpected error happen, one option is to go back to the homepage

pages.generic_error.sign_out_and_reload.description: When an unxpected error happen, one option is to try to sign out the account and reload the page

pages.generic_error.technical_details.it.description: Technical details for the error, showing the error name and message

pages.generic_error.text.description: Text of the generic error page
pages.generic_error.text.message: This may be the result of a bug or failing to reach the homeserver. You can retry loading the page, go back to the previous page, or reset everything and go back to the homepage.

pages.generic_error.title.description: Title of the generic error page

pages.landing.description.description: On the landing pages, explains what the app does
pages.landing.description.message: Manage the deployment of the element app for your organization or community.

pages.login.errors.no_auth_metadata.description: Error message on the login page when we couldn't fetch the auth metadata, indicating that either Synapse is down, or not configured to use MAS
pages.login.errors.no_auth_metadata.message: Failed to load the server's auth metadata. Synapse may be unreachable or not configured to use Matrix Authentication Service.

pages.login.errors.no_client_metadata.description: Error message on the login page when we couldn't register the client against the auth metadata, indicating that either MAS is down, or refusing the client registration for some reason
pages.login.errors.no_client_metadata.message: Failed to register the client. Matrix Authentication Service may be unreachable or misconfigured.

pages.login.errors.no_well_known.description: Error message on the login page when we couldn't fetch the well-known document at https://{serverName}/.well-known/matrix/client
pages.login.errors.no_well_known.message: Failed to load the server's well-known document. The server name may be invalid.

pages.login.get_started.description: On the login page, this starts the authorization process

pages.login.server_name.description: Label for the server name field

product.title.description: The main name of the admin console

room_info.empty_room.description: Name of a room when the room has no explicit name and no member

room_info.empty_space.description: Name of a space when the space has no explicit name and no member

room_info.room_with.description: Name we display for a room with no explicit name. In this case, we show the list of members, e.g. 'Room with Alice and Bob'

room_info.space_with.description: Name we display for a space with no explicit name. In this case, we show the list of members, e.g. 'Space with Alice and Bob'

room_info.unknown_user.description: When showing the room name based on members, this is the fallback when we can't load the member name for some reason

rooms_info.other_members.description: When a room or space has no name, we show 'Room/Space with Alice, Bob and 3 others'. This is the 'X others' part.

ui.data.failed_to_load.description: In a data grid, when a specific data value failed to load

ui.data.loading.description: In a data grid, aria label for when a data value is loading
